summary: Master teacher looking for new role and Industry. I'm looking to leverage the valuable skills, knowledge, and experiences as a teacher to advance a new client or organization in an executive or leadership position.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Teaches classes in accordance with requirements of approved courses of study and monitors student progress; plans using information about students' strengths and needs; designs activities aligned to standards to promote high levels of learning; maintains a safe, supportive classroom environment; initiates and participates in IEP meetings; uses behavior modification techniques to implement IEP goals; communicates with families; fosters collaboration through group projects; evaluates performance of subordinate personnel.

experience.title: Robotics and Design Instructor
experience.description: Provided lectures on Robotics kits, programming, and theory; enhanced design knowledge through instructor-oriented workshops; modified lessons to accommodate diverse learners using peer-assisted learning and group work.

experience.title: Executive Advisor
experience.description: Portfolio management realizing 20-25% annually over 5 year period; conducted research and analytics; provided relocation services for clients and families; guided clients through Time and Asset Restructuring System; developed anti-fragile contingency and recovery strategies for Black Swan events; planned and launched large-scale events increasing revenue; implemented process improvements to automate office operations; improved office efficiency and internal communications; drafted work contracts.
